TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool ShouldOverwriteCallback(object source, object destination);
.class public auto ansi sealed ShouldOverwriteCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: Instance of source used to overwrite the destination.
Instance of destination to be overwritten.
Docs.summary: Callback invoked to tell whether to overwrite an existing destination.
Docs.returns: True if the file should be overwritten; otherwise false.
